# Project Scope Document

## Project Name
E-Commerce Platform Modernization

## Objectives
1. Migrate legacy PHP application to Node.js/React
2. Implement microservices architecture
3. Add real-time inventory tracking
4. Improve checkout conversion rate by 20%

## In Scope

### Phase 1 (MVP)
- User authentication and authorization
- Product catalog with search
- Shopping cart
- Basic checkout flow
- Order history

### Phase 2 (Enhancement)
- Payment gateway integration (Stripe, PayPal)
- Inventory management
- Email notifications
- Admin dashboard

### Phase 3 (Optimization)
- Performance optimization
- A/B testing framework
- Analytics integration
- Mobile app (React Native)

## Out of Scope
- Physical store integration
- Multi-currency support (future phase)
- Loyalty program (future phase)

## Key Stakeholders
- Product Owner: John Smith
- Tech Lead: Jane Doe
- QA Lead: Bob Wilson

## Timeline
- Phase 1: 8 weeks
- Phase 2: 6 weeks
- Phase 3: 4 weeks

## Success Criteria
- 99.9% uptime
- <2s page load time
- 20% improvement in checkout conversion
- Zero critical security vulnerabilities
